cit:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Bedford Institute of Oceanography, Fisheries and Oceans Canada

cit:title.gco:CharacterString: Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System Metadata Profile of ISO 19115
Maritimes Region Historical Offshore Moored Time Series Data

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Données chronologiques historiques sur les navires amarrés au large de la région des Maritimes

mri:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Historical missions offshore in which DFO Bedford Institute of Oceanography participated in between 1970s to present which collected moored time series data. These missions were part of various projects and visited several areas within Canadian waters such as: Scotian Shelf, Labrador Sea, Gulf of St Lawrence, Bay of Fundy, and Northwest Atlantic.

lan:textGroup.lan:LocalisedCharacterString: Missions historiques en mer auxquelles l'Institut océanographique de Bedford de Pêches et Océans Canada a participé entre les années 1970 et aujourd'hui et qui ont permis de recueillir des données chronologiques amarrées. Ces missions s'inscrivaient dans le cadre de divers projets et ont visité plusieurs zones des eaux canadiennes, telles que le plateau néo-écossais, la mer du Labrador, le golfe du Saint-Laurent, la baie de Fundy et l'Atlantique Nord-Ouest.

mcc:description.gco:CharacterString: EPSG::5831 - Instantaneous Water Level depth - Depth relative to instantaneous water level uncorrected for tide. Not specific to any location or epoch.
